description.narrative: This activity (Global Learning Project England - Implementation) is a component of Global Learning Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £15,174,770. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Teacher training, Educational research, Basic life skills for youth and adults. The start date is 01-05-2012 and the end date is 30-04-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Basic life skills for youth and adults

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - advanced technical and managerial training
Education - Social Affairs - Education - basic adult education
